snippet: After five runner-up finishes at the Australian Open, world number one Andy Murray is taking a different approach to the season-opening grand slam at Melbourne Park next month....
lead_paragraph: After five runner-up finishes at the Australian Open, world number one Andy Murray is taking a different approach to the season-opening grand slam at Melbourne Park next month.

headline.print_headline: Murray Tries Different Australian Open Preparation
headline.main: Murray Tries Different Australian Open Preparation
